flixel.system.frontEnds.DebuggerFrontEnd

type
class

Constructor

new()
Used to instantiate this class and assign a value to toggleKeys

Instance Variables

pointPrecision : Int

The amount of decimals FlxPoints are rounded to in log / watch.

toggleKeys : Array<String>

The key codes used to toggle the debugger (see FlxG.keys for the keys available). Default keys: ` and \. Set to null to deactivate.

visible(default,accessor) : Bool

Whether the debugger is visible or not.

visualDebug : Bool

Whether to show visual debug displays or not. Doesn't exist in FLX_NO_DEBUG mode.

Instance Methods

addButton(Alignment : flixel.system.debug.ButtonAlignment, IconPath : String, DownHandler : Dynamic, ?ToggleMode : Bool, ?UpdateLayout : Bool) : flixel.system.ui.FlxSystemButton

parameters
Position Either LEFT, MIDDLE or RIGHT.
IconPath The path to the image to use as the icon for the button.
DownHandler The function to be called when the button is pressed.
ToggleMode Whether this is a toggle button or not.
UpdateLayout Whether to update the button layout.
Create and add a new debugger button.

inline resetLayout() : Void

Just resets the debugger windows to whatever the last selected layout was (STANDARD by default).

inline setLayout(Layout : flixel.system.debug.DebuggerLayout) : Void

parameters
Layout The layout codes can be found in FlxDebugger, for example FlxDebugger.MICRO
Change the way the debugger's windows are laid out.
